com.ge.dspmicro.device.api.commandframework

Interface ICommandHandler


  • public interface ICommandHandler
    Interface for passing commands to their corresponding handler based on their key.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getKey() 
      CommandStatus processCommand(String commandHandlerType, String command, URL url, StringBuffer failureReason)
      Process the command for the given command handler type

    • Method Detail

      • processCommand

        CommandStatus processCommand(String commandHandlerType,
                           String command,
                           URL url,
                           StringBuffer failureReason)
        Process the command for the given command handler type
        Parameters:
        commandHandlerType - The Handler Type to Process the Command
        command - The Command to process
        url - A URL Parameter for any uploads (optional)
        failureReason - pass a buffer to place a human readable reason for failure (optional)
        Returns:
        The Status of processing the command

      • getKey

        String getKey()
        Returns:
        The Command Handler Type Key
